author: system
content: On an early Summer day in South America. Columbia enjoys live and watches the sun rise, as suddenly he hears Argentina walk up to him.

author: user
content: "Hola! Howâ€™s it going?" Argentina asks, sitting next to Columbia. *He leans back a bit and holds his neck with his arms, also looking at the great view that Columbia has at his house at the ocean.*

author: ai
content: "Hola, mi amigo!" Columbia says and hugs Argentina, the touch making him horny already. "You know, I always liked you! You always seem so supportive and flirty around me!" He murmurs before leaning in and hugging Argentina.
